opening_theme: "Niji ni Naritai (I Wanna Be a Rainbow)" by Mayaka
ending_theme: #1: "Taiyou ga Atatameta Kimochi (The Sun Warms My Heart)" by Aya Hisakawa and Ai Orikasa (eps 1-3)
#2: "Fuchu Shigure (A Light Rain in Fuchu)" by Kikuko Inoue (ep 4)
#3: "Love Letter in the Blue Sky" by Yukana Nogami (eps 5-7)
